channel.title: Jail command anyone?
channel.description: Please help.. I really need a jail and unjail command that would work for Allstarscape/reapagescape Anyone able to help? please? :S regards.

item.title: Jail command anyone?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

It probably does work for you because you probably have your IsInJail method, or whatever yours is called, to say if someone is in a certain area, then they’re always teleblocked. You didn’t put that here, all you added here was your commands, you never included your method for your jailing area. Also, this wouldn’t help this guy at all because this guy probably isn’t active on these forums anymore, as this was posted back in September 23, 2008 and the last time he was active was in April 07, 2009…

item.title: Jail command anyone?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“labeeb, post:4, topic:232785”]even though i solved some1’s problem. im sorry for asking for rep, as i didnt know that was alowed.

but its okay, dont say thanks, just be a stuck up little mother fucking bitch with ur tiny penis.[/quote]

WOOOOOOOOW! Fuck you man. Really uncalled for and wasn’t necessary.

  1. Use coding tags next time.
  2. As the guy said above, don’t ask for rep. Because it’s against the rules, you’ll get yours reset to 0, the guy can’t even rep you in the first place, and like you said, you take no credit for it so don’t fucking ask for it if these ain’t your codes.
  3. Where it says if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } makes no fucking sense AT ALL because it’s saying if you’re teleblocked, then you can’t jail somebody…? What the hell?
  4. Those commands do no shit at all. All the person getting jailed has to do is log out and in and they’re free to go.
  5. You grave-dug a topic from September 23, 2008. Way to go, champion.

To summarize above, you are a jackass with a shitty attitude. Have a nice day.

Read full topic

item.title: Jail command anyone?
item.dc:creator: @yourusername yourusername
item.description:
@yourusername wrote:

[quote=“labeeb, post:2, topic:232785”]yea here it is:

put this in ur client folder:

    }

if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); //made by Musicmad441
}
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 3228;
c.teleportToY = 3407;
c.teleblock = true;
c.sendMessage(“You have been Jailed by a Staff Member”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Staff Member " + playerName + " has Jailed "
+ command.substring(5);
c.teleblock = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

and here is the unjail command

}
else if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) {
String name = command.substring(7);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 3093;
c.teleportToY = 3491;
c.teleblock = false;
c.sendMessage(“You have been released from Jail”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Staff Member " + playerName + " has released”
+ command.substring(5);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

put both of these in ur client folder.

Rep++ me please

this is leeched, then edited to your liking.

it takes u to varrock cell

thanks, ( i take no credit) - labeeb[/quote]
Do NOT ask for rep.

Read full topic
